tasks.subject: Linear Algebra
tasks.description: In this assignment, you will implement Principal Component Analysis (PCA) from scratch to reduce the dimensionality of a dataset. PCA is a widely used technique in data analysis and machine learning for reducing the number of features while preserving as much variance in the data as possible.
